item.title: PHP 5.4.x on CentOS 6.5
item.description: Quick copy and paste list of commands to get PHP 5.4 on CentOS boxes Enable remi repo sudo nano /etc/yum.repos.d/remi.repo Update sudo yum update doneâ€¦ now you can follow these instructions to install LAMP stack
